title: loading screen freeze
body: everything works fine until i get into the loading screen it loads until like 78% then keeps crashing T^T please help!

replies.body:
This is a great place to start, as the most common issue that prevents loading into a match is an unstable connection to the servers. This above guide goes over the most common solutions for a problematic connection. If you should still see issues, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

Let me know if you have any questions.
